paramagpy.metal.Metal.dipole_shift_tensor¶

Metal.dipole_shift_tensor(position)[source]¶

Calculate the chemical shift tensor at the given postition

This arises due to the paramagnetic dipole tensor field

Parameters:position (array floats) – the position (x, y, z) in meters
Returns:dipole_shift_tensor – the tensor describing chemical shift at the nuclear position
Return type:3x3 array
